ccipSend(uint64,(bytes,bytes,(address,ui.details: Ignores destinationChainSelectorReturns a mock message ID, which is not calculated from the message contents in the same way as the real message ID.

routeMessage((bytes32,uint64,bytes,bytes.details: if the receiver is a contracts that signals support for CCIP execution through EIP-165. the contract is called. If not, only tokens are transferred.

returns.gasUsed: the gas used by the external customer call. Does not include any overhead.
returns.retData: A bytes array containing return data form CCIP receiver.
returns.success: A boolean value indicating whether the ccip message was received without errors.

ccipSend(uint64,(bytes,bytes,(address,ui.notice: Sends the tx locally to the receiver instead of on the destination chain.

getFee(uint64,(bytes,bytes,(address,uint.notice: Returns 0 as the fee is not supported in this mock contract.

isChainSupported(uint64).notice: Always returns true to make sure this check can be performed on any chain.

routeMessage((bytes32,uint64,bytes,bytes.notice: Route the message to its intended receiver contract.
